item.title: 7 Startups Join Mastercard Program to Make Cryptocurrency More Accessible
item.description: 7 Startups Join Mastercard Program to Make Cryptocurrency More Accessible Payments giant Mastercard has added seven startups to its Start Path program to make cryptocurrencies more accessible.

item.title: Mastercard Study: African Fintech Sector Had One of the Highest Year-on-Year Growth Rates in Funding in 2021
item.description: Mastercard Study: African Fintech Sector Had One of the Highest Year-on-Year Growth Rates in Funding in 2021 In 2021, African fintech startups accounted for 61% of the $2.
